name: Unforgiving Trials: The Darkest Crusade
description: Embark on an epic adventure to save the lands. Form a party by selecting 4 different adventurers from a pool of over 12 unique classes. Battle your way through the cursed lands scaling the highest mountains and exploring the darkest dungeons. Face more than 30 unique challenging bosses in order to reach the capital of the kingdom.

reviews.review_text: I was really thinking this game would be fun. It started out good when you got to pick your party of 4 in inn where there was many different type to choose from. It looked good and interesting story to start but then that is where it just ended. Game enters automode when you start journey and your party auto walk from one battle to next. All you can do is pick their attack and then later buy new items for them but that is all. It is very repetive and dissapointing. Graphics are very nice but I have to give thumb down because there was no story at all.

I've always been a fan of RPG games and I chose to download this one because it reminded me of the classic ones  There is a plenty of characters to chose from and combined with variety of skills is what keeps it interesting  Considering the cost and the amount of time I dedicated and the entertainment I got out of the game I would say that I was satisfied enough to say it was a good game.
